I have been duly appointed trustee of this estate and report that I have neither received nor been paid any money on account of this estate and that this case has been dismissed. Pursuant to FRBP 5009, I request that this report be approved and that I be discharged from any further duties as trustee. (MANEY, EDWARD 12) (Entered: 01/24/2008)

The case having been dismissed; IT IS ORDERED that the case is closed and if a trustee has been appointed, the trustee is discharged from and relieved of his trust. Bankruptcy Judge James M. Marlar. (Beckett, Evelyn) (Entered: 02/05/2008)
